HE:cloud - Cloud Application Development Services

  • Build your own cloud platform

    A cloud platform is an environment to deploy applications. To allow you to grow, this platform must be scalable and reliable. Based on the requirements of your business, we guide you to select which is the best platform that will suit your business perfectly. The platform provides resources and an elastic layer integration with web services for their applications.

  • Customize with what is best for you

    Reduce development time of your applications by using the features that are ready. Our packages already include pre-built functionality to reduce their costs. We help you build the architecture of your applications by taking advantage of all the existing features, with that you can focus all your development in functionality that will make your application unique.

  • Ensure that your application is ready

    Our team has an extensive experience in development and architecture for applications in the cloud. We have already developed hundreds of applications and we can guarantee that your application will be truly ready to fly in the clouds. Help throughout the development cycle and can participate as a member of your team, providing consulting and training for your or even taking full responsibility for the development.

  • Adaptable platform

    Whether your application written in Ruby, Python, PHP, Scala, Groovy or even Java, cloud have open and closed solutions, which can run on public, private or hybrid clouds.

  • Reduced time

    Using our packages you speed up the process of integration with other services and platforms, from your ERP to Twitter. And if the integration does not already exist, we can create it for you.

  • Cloud Your Way

    We plan everything for your cloud work and fly in heights. Everything will work as your application needs and deserves.


Interested? Get in touch!
